item.title: Tidy Tuesday for 9/1/2020
item.description: For this Tidy Tuesday challenge we used data files from Our World in Data describing crop yields across the globe from 1960-present. Data can be found at https://ourworldindata.org/crop-yields Peas seemed appealing at the time and I never see them growing here in Marylandâ€“ where do they come from? I plotted a line graph with tons of peas produced per hectare on the y-axis, year (range from 1990 to 2020) on the x-axis, and continent as line color.
